name: Zelda (BotW, TotK)
description:
So I've decided since I have so many Zeldas to get through I'll alternate between Zelda and non-Zelda. Next Zelda will be Young Zelda from OoT due to a request. After that will be Sheik also due to a request.

Yes, this LoRA does both BotW and TotK. For BotW just use the main trigger and either outfit tag if you'd like. For TotK use the main trigger and the TotK one. Yes, that means including botw in the totk trigger.

Also, it's not great at making her coat outfit but you can try.

As Usual:
Trained on Anything v3
Demos are Anything v4.5 with weight 0.9 this time for the LoRA
It also likes to have (EasyNegative:0.8) instead of full strength.

modelVersions.name: zelda_BotW_v1
trainedWords: pricess zelda, nintendo, the legend of zelda, botw
